document.full_text: after eight years battling california's intractable budget issues, arnold schwarzenegger clearly has a wistful yearning for the life of the governator, the animated superhero he unveiled this week in cannes.
document.title: schwarzenegger superhero will overlook civil rights
lines_and_colors: after eight years battling california's intractable budget issues, arnold schwarzenegger clearly has a wistful yearning for the life of the governator, the animated superhero he unveiled this week in cannes.
